text: Reni Santoni (April 21, 1939 – August 1, 2020) was an American actor. He was born in New York City. His career began in 1962 and he retired in 2012. He was known for his roles as Inspector "Chico" González in 1971's Dirty Harry, as prison official Ramon Herrera in Bad Boys (1983), and as Detective Tony Gonzales in the action movie Cobra (1986). Santoni died on August 1, 2020 under hospice care in Los Angeles from cancer at the age of 81.Reni Santoni, Actor in 'Enter Laughing' and 'Dirty Harry,' Dies at 81 ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from New York City
title: Reni Santoni
